alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 23 at 7:49AM EST until November 23 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility quarter to half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Inland Palm Beach, Metro Palm Beach, Inland Broward, Metro Broward, Inland Miami-Dade, Metro Miami-Dade, Coastal Palm Beach, Coastal Broward, Coastal Miami-Dade and Far South Miami- Dade Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
